mean_cn: v.发出（砰的响声）；  n.砰的一声爆破声；  adj.流行的，大众的
mean_en: to make a short explosive sound; to cause something to make this sound; to burst, or make something burst, with a short explosive sound; to suddenly appear, especially when not expected; to put something/somebody somewhere quickly, suddenly or for a short time
sentence_trans: 让我们砰的一声开启这瓶香槟吧！
